node.hospital_zh: 東區尤德夫人那打素醫院
node.detail_zh: 患者與丈夫（第 #89 宗個案患者）同居於美輪大廈，也曾到北角福慧精舍（即第 #70 宗個案患者曾到的地方），據報她每天早上會到佛堂「幾分鐘」。她於 2 月 13 日因肌肉痛，曾向 2 名私家醫求診， 2 月 22 日到東區醫院， 2 月 23 日確診。
node.detail_en: The patient lives with her husband in Maylun Apartments, 23 Shu Kuk Street, North Point and visits Fook Wai Ching She (the place which patient no. 70 has also visited) every morning for "a couple of minutes". She developed muscle pain on Feb 13 and consulted two private doctors. She was admitted to Pamela Youde Nethersole Eastern Hospital on Feb 22 and tested positive for coronavirus on Feb 23.
node.classification_zh: 可能本地個案的密切接觸者

groups.description_zh: 「福慧精舍」佛堂位於北角美輪大廈，相關患者包括佛堂工作人員及善信。「福慧精舍」是本港第三宗超級傳播事件。福群組患者中，最早病發日期是 2 月 8 日。
groups.description_en: "Fook Wai Ching She" is a Buddhist preaching hall located in Maylun Apartments, North Point. Related infected patients include staff members and followers. This is the third case of super-spreader. The case was first discovered on Feb 8.

node.location_zh: 書局街 1-25 號美輪大廈
node.remarks_zh: 與丈夫（第 89 宗患者）同住
node.remarks_en: The patient lives with her husband (patient no. 89).

node.location_zh: 昌苑大廈鄭澤德醫生診所
node.location_en: Dr. Cheng Chak Tak, Charles, Cheong Yuen Building

node.location_zh: 書局街 1-25 號美輪大廈福慧精舍
node.location_en: Fook Wai Ching She, Maylun Apartments, 1-25 Shu Kuk Street
node.remarks_zh: 每朝都會到佛堂逗留數分鐘
node.remarks_en: The patient goes to preaching hall for several minutes daily

node.location_zh: 渣華道 62-68 號高發大廈地下健一醫務中心
node.location_en: Priority Healthcare Medical Centre, G/F, Goldfield Mansion, 62-68 Java Road
